00026 XmlParser::XmlParser(string mode)
00027 {
00028         this->mode = mode;
00029 }
00030

00034 
00035 Document XmlParser::getDocument(string xml)
00036 {
00037         ifstream infile(xml.c_str());
00038         string temp;
00039         if(infile.is_open())
00040         {
00041                 xml = "";
00042                 while(getline(infile, temp))
00043                 {
00044                         if(temp.find("<?")==string::npos && temp.find("?>")==string::npos)
00045                                 xml.append(temp);
00046                 }
00047         }
00048         Document doc;
00049         Element root;
00050         if(xml.find("<")!=string::npos && xml.find(">")!=string::npos)
00051         {
00052                 if(xml.find("<?")!=string::npos && xml.find("?>")!=string::npos)
00053                 {
00054                         xml = xml.substr(xml.find("?>")+2);
00055                 }
00056                 readXML(xml,"",&root);
00057         }
00058         doc.setRootElement(root);
00059         return doc;
00060 }
00061 
00062 void XmlParser::readXML(string xml,string parent,Element *par)
00063 {
00064         if(xml=="")
00065                 return;
00066         int st = xml.find("<")+1;
00067     int ed = 0;
00068     int ed1 = xml.find("/>");
00069     int ed2 = xml.find(">");
00070     if((ed2<ed1 || ed1==-1) && ed2!=-1)
00071         ed = ed2;
00072     else if(ed1!=-1)
00073     {
00074         /*if(xml[ed1+1]=='>')*/
00075                 ed = ed1;
00076         /*else
00077                 ed = ed2;*/
00078     }
00079     string tag = xml.substr(st,ed-st);
00080     int ss = tag.find_first_not_of(" ");
00081     int se = tag.find_last_not_of(" ")+1;
00082     tag = tag.substr(ss,se-ss);
00083     Element element;
00084 
00085     //split the tag with a space to get all the attribute sets of the element
00086     string ta;
00087     if(tag.find_first_of(" ")!=string::npos)
00088     {
00089         ta = tag.substr(0,tag.find_first_of(" "));
00090         tag = tag.substr(tag.find_first_of(" ")+1);
00091         while(tag.find_first_of("=")!=string::npos && tag.find_first_of("\"")!=string::npos)
00092         {
00093             string atname = tag.substr(0,tag.find_first_of("="));
00094             int as = atname.find_first_not_of(" ");
00095             int ae = atname.find_last_not_of(" ")+1;
00096             atname = atname.substr(as,ae-as);
00097             int ds = tag.find_first_of("\"")+1;
00098             tag = tag.substr(ds);
00099             string atvalue = tag.substr(0,tag.find_first_of("\""));
00100             tag = tag.substr(tag.find_first_of("\"")+1);
00101             if(parent!="")
00102                         {
00103                 element.addAttribute(atname,atvalue);
00104                         }
00105                         else
00106                         {
00107                                 par->addAttribute(atname,atvalue);
00108                         }
00109             cout << "attname = " << atname << "   attvalue = " << atvalue << "\n" << flush;
00110         }
00111     }
00112     else
00113         ta = tag;
00114     int initcheck = xml.find_first_of("<");
00115     unsigned int someTag = (xml.substr(initcheck+1)).find("<");
00116     int pndTag=0,endTag=0;
00117     if(xml.find("</"+ta)!=string::npos)
00118         pndTag = xml.find("</"+ta);
00119     else if(xml.find("/>")!=string::npos && xml.find("/>")<someTag)
00120         endTag = xml.find("/>");
00121     if(xml.find("< ")!=string::npos)
00122     {
00123         string errmsg = ("Invalid Start Tag - at position: " + boost::lexical_cast<string>(xml.find("< ")+1) + "\n");
00124         throw new XmlParseException(errmsg);
00125     }
00126     else if(xml.find("<\t")!=string::npos)
00127     {
00128         string errmsg = ("Invalid Start Tag - at position: " + boost::lexical_cast<string>(xml.find("<\t")+1) + "\n");
00129         throw new XmlParseException(errmsg);
00130     }
00131     else if(xml.find("</ ")!=string::npos)
00132     {
00133         string errmsg = ("Invalid End Tag - at position: " + boost::lexical_cast<string>(xml.find("</ ")+1) + "\n");
00134         throw new XmlParseException(errmsg);
00135     }
00136     else if(xml.find("</\t")!=string::npos)
00137     {
00138         string errmsg = ("Invalid End Tag - at position: " + boost::lexical_cast<string>(xml.find("</\t")+1) + "\n");
00139         throw new XmlParseException(errmsg);
00140     }
00141     else if(xml.find("< /")!=string::npos)
00142     {
00143         string errmsg = ("Invalid End Tag - at position: " + boost::lexical_cast<string>(xml.find("< /")+1) + "\n");
00144         throw new XmlParseException(errmsg);
00145     }
00146     else if(xml.find("/ >")!=string::npos)
00147         {
00148                 string errmsg = ("Invalid End Tag - at position: " + boost::lexical_cast<string>(xml.find("/ >")+1) + "\n");
00149                 throw new XmlParseException(errmsg);
00150         }
00151     else if(xml.find("<\t/")!=string::npos)
00152     {
00153         string errmsg = ("Invalid End Tag - at position: " + boost::lexical_cast<string>(xml.find("<\t/")+1) + "\n");
00154         throw new XmlParseException(errmsg);
00155     }
00156     else if(xml.find("<"+ta)==string::npos && xml.find("</"+ta)!=string::npos)
00157     {
00158         string errmsg = ("No Start Tag - for : " + ta + "\n");
00159         throw new XmlParseException(errmsg);
00160     }
00161     else if(xml.find("<"+ta)!=string::npos && pndTag==0 && endTag==0)
00162     {
00163         string errmsg = ("No End Tag - for : " + ta + "\n");
00164         throw new XmlParseException(errmsg);
00165     }
00166     if(xml.find("<"+ta)!=string::npos && (xml.find("</"+ta)!=string::npos || xml.find("/>")!=string::npos))
00167     {
00168         cout << "tag = " << ta << flush;
00169         cout << "   parent = " << parent << flush;
00170         cout << "\n" << flush;
00171 
00172         if(ed==ed1)
00173         {
00174                 if(parent!="")
00175                         {
00176                                 element.setTagName(ta);
00177                                 par->addElement(element);
00178                         }
00179                         else
00180                         {
00181                                 par->setTagName(ta);
00182                         }
00183                 xml = xml.substr(xml.find("/>")+2);
00184         }
00185         else if(xml.find("</"+ta)!=string::npos)
00186                 {
00187                         //split each set by = to get the pairs
00188                         string tagx = "</"+ta+">";
00189                         int end = xml.find("</"+ta+">");
00190                         string txml = xml.substr(ed+1,end-ed-1);
00191                         cout << "temp = " << txml << flush;
00192                         cout << "\n" << flush;
00193                         if(parent!="")
00194                         {
00195                                 element.setTagName(ta);
00196                                 if(txml.find("<")!=string::npos)
00197                                         readXML(txml,ta,&element);
00198                                 else
00199                                         element.setText(txml);
00200                                 par->addElement(element);
00201                         }
00202                         else
00203                         {
00204                                 par->setTagName(ta);
00205                                 if(txml.find("<")!=string::npos)
00206                                         readXML(txml,ta,par);
00207                                 else
00208                                         par->setText(txml);
00209                         }
00210                         xml = xml.substr(end+tagx.length());
00211                 }
00212     }
00213     if(xml.find("<")!=string::npos && (xml.find("</")!=string::npos || xml.find("/>")!=string::npos))
00214     {
00215         cout << "xml = " << xml << flush;
00216         cout << "\n" << flush;
00217         readXML(xml,parent,par);
00218     }
00219     else if(xml.find("<")!=string::npos && (xml.find("</")==string::npos || xml.find("/>")==string::npos))
00220     {
00221         string errmsg = ("Invalid Start Tag\n");
00222         throw new XmlParseException(errmsg);
00223     }
00224     else if(xml.find("<")==string::npos && (xml.find("</")!=string::npos || xml.find("/>")!=string::npos))
00225         {
00226                 string errmsg = ("Invalid End Tag\n");
00227                 throw new XmlParseException(errmsg);
00228         }
00229 }
